base.welcome:
Welcome to Crown Heights Mutual Aid Slack!

Check out the quick welcome doc below.
It's made with love by neighbors in this Slack üéâüéâüéâ

newVolunteer.message:
Thanks for signing up to volunteer!
 If you want to call neighbors in need, please see if there are any upcoming intake training shifts:

trainedVolunteer.message: You've been trained for intake! Here are some links for ya:

volunteerSignUp.message:
Your Slack email isn't in our volunteer records.
If you want to get involved more please fill it out!
volunteerSignUp.errorMessage: If you already submitted one, it might take this page a few minutes to update üí¶üíæüíæüí¶

error.noRequest: We couldn't find a request with that code. Please make sure it exists in the Requests table.
error.noVolunteer: No intake volunteer was assigned to the request ID you entered :/
error.alreadyAssigned: This request looks like it already has a delivery volunteer!
error.noPermission:
It doesn't look like you are assigned to this request :/
Let #tech know if we messed up.
error.airtableError:
Error updating the Request in Airtable. Please try again.

 You can update Airtable and message the delivery volunteer manually if it still doesn't work :/
error.default: An error occured. Let us know in #tech

message.text: Thanks to you both for volunteering. Here's some details on the request. Let's help some neighbors!
message.reminder: _***UPDATED REMINDER***: When shopping, wear a mask, wear gloves or sanitize hands thoroughly before entering the store, and generally maintain good social distancing practices. When you make a delivery, drop the groceries at the door, step 6 feet away, and make sure that the recipient knows to wipe down all the groceries (or wash with soap and water). Here are some <{{- flyersUrl}}|safety flyers> if you are able to print them and slip into the bags._
message.outro:
*Submit your receipt:* Afterwards, please fill out this handy <{{- reimbursementUrl}}|reimbursement form>, it will automatically post to the #community_reimbursement channel!

For more info, please see the <{{- guideUrl}}|delivery guide>.

postNotify.message: {{delivererName}} you're on! You'll get a DM soon with details :slightly_smiling_face:

modal.message: If you give us the request code, we'll update all the airtable info and start a DM between you both.
modal.dmOption: Start a DM with request info between you and the assignee
modal.threadOption: Reply to the thread with confirmation
modal.title: Assign to Delivery

error.noVolunteer: No volunteer with email: {{- userEmail}}. Did you use your slack email to sign up?
error.noPendingRequests:
Couldn't find any pending requests. Do you have requests assigned to you in the 'Delivery Needed' state?
 It's also possible you already posted this in Slack using the bot.

message.intro: Hey Crown Heights, we have a new request from our neighbor {{firstName}} at {{streets}} in *{{quadrant}}*
message.outro:
*Want to volunteer to help our neighbor{{firstName}}?* Head to our <https://crownheightsma.herokuapp.com/delivery-needed?sms_pickup=true|online SMS pickup map> to find the code and click ‚ÄúClaim Delivery‚Äù!
_Reminder: Please don‚Äôt volunteer for delivery if you have any COVID-19/cold/flu-like symptoms, or have come into contact with someone that‚Äôs tested positive. If you have been in large crowds or demonstrations, please self-isolate for 14 days or wait 5 days to get a test, and resume deliveries after testing negative._
message.outroPay:
Submit your receipt: please fill out this handy reimbursement form, it will automatically post to the #community_reimbursement channel!
For more information, please see the delivery guide.
message.guide: For more information, please see the <{{- guideUrl}}|delivery guide>.

post.deliveryCongrats: :tada: Shout out to {{- deliveryVolunteer}} for volunteering to help! :tada:

error.notAMessage: This shortcut can only be used on messages.
error.notBotPost: You can only edit messages posted by the bot.
error.noPermission: You aren't permitted to edit this message.

button.confirmMessage: The post cannot be un-deleted and any threads will remain.

label.edit: You can edit the post's content:
label.deletion: Or, if you'd like you can remove the post entirely:

message.intro:
Hey neighbors!
:tada::tada: {{- deliverer}} completed a delivery and could use reimbursement! :tada::tada:
message.outro:
*Want to send money?* Please send any amount to a payment method above and then reply to this post with the amount sent.
The bot isn't smart and will register the first number it finds, so please try and only include one dollar amount!
This example works fine:
> Sent 20!

code.default: @chma-admins this request is missing a code!

requestNotFound.message:
*Request Not Found!*
 :robot_face::robot_face: The request code for a reimbursement didn't exist! If there's an issue, please tag @chma-admins!

details.first: :rabbit::tophat::question: The rundown: To help fund our grocery aid deliveries and make sure all bills are paid, we‚Äôve created this *hat*, the kind passed around at concerts, collecting tips for the band. Everyday the hat is passed to different CHMA members, but we promise you won‚Äôt get the hat again for at least a few weeks!
details.second: :money_with_wings: So if you‚Äôre able to donate any amount, whether it‚Äôs $3 or $30, please do! You‚Äôd be helping out a lot--no donation is too small! If you‚Äôre unable to donate, no worries at all!
details.third: :pie: It‚Äôs as easy as *venmoing {{- venmoHandle}}*. This Venmo account belongs to {{- venmoUser}} who will disburse the funds they collect to our delivery volunteers in need of reimbursements (receipts posted in #community_reimbursement). Use a :tophat: or :luckyhat: in the venmo comment, or just type in CHMA hat!

message.intro:
:luckyhat: CHMA Hat! :luckyhat:
Hi there! We‚Äôre passing the CHMA hat to you today!
message.tldr: *tl;dr:* If able, please venmo *{{- venmoHandle}}* a small donation today. They will use all the funds to cover our grocery deliveries! :bike:
message.outro: Thank you for all you do in Crown Heights Mutual Aid! :fist:
